channel.title: Making a npc a shop help please
channel.description: How do i make a npc a shop i want a combat constructor to be a shop for barrows...can anyone post on what i need to do[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 07:49:32 PM[/size][hr]wtf!!! why doesnt anyone post to my threads!!

item.title: Making a npc a shop help please
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

in shop .cfg

add the item id then the amount for example

1234 50

item.title: Making a npc a shop help please
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

ok so i go in shop.cfg and type a shop id like 30…and add the npc id then where do i add the items lol sorry if im being a nub :[br][size=1]Posted on: September 17, 2007, 06:13:58 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Waffles!!, post:5, topic:144098”]Autospawn needed. Shops.cfg needed

else if (NPCID == #) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = #; }
Neeed somewhere in client.java.
Somewhere under

case 155: //first Click npc

Or second click npc.[/quote]

ok…i did that and i get 100 errors

item.title: Making a npc a shop help please
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Autospawn needed. Shops.cfg needed

else if (NPCID == #) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = #; }
Neeed somewhere in client.java.
Somewhere under

case 155: //first Click npc

Or second click npc.
